snippet: Retail sales rose 1.1 percent last month, the Commerce Department said.
abstract: Commerce Department reports that retail sales posted their largest gain in five months in February, with Americans feeling confident enough in the economy to purchase more cars and other goods even as gasoline prices rise; sales rose 1.1 percent for the month, following a 0.6 percent increase in January.
lead_paragraph: Retail sales rose 1.1 percent last month, the Commerce Department said.

headline.seo: February Retail Sales the Highest in 5 Months
headline.main: Retail Sales Gain the Most in 5 Months
headline.print_headline: Retail Sales Gain the Most in 5 Months
